name: Cyber Defense 2088
summary: Its the 80s again, the 2080s, and your mainframe is under attack from rival factions who want to take our city and all we have achieved. Multiple generations of people have settled here since 1986 and called this place their home. They are in trouble and you decide the best defense is a good offence and allow yourself to be transformed into pure energy. You leave behind the physical world and enter this new virtual reality called cyberspace! Your first priority is New Zylon, save it from these attacks,...
